question:
Which of the following segments have been identified for acquisition under Strategic Partnership Model in Defence Acquisition?
  1. Fighter Aircraft
  2. Helicopters
  3. Submarines
  4. Armoured Fighting Vehicles (AFVs)
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The Strategic Partnerships Model in Defence sector was approved by Defence Acquisition Council (DAC) in May 2017. The policy aims to encourage broader participation of the private sector, in addition to DPSUs/OFB, in the manufacture of defence platforms and equipment such as aircraft, submarines, helicopters and armoured vehicles. The four segments that have been identified for acquisition under Strategic Partnership (SP) route are Fighter Aircraft; Helicopters; Submarines & Armoured Fighting Vehicles (AFVs).
